,:� BATH COMMUNITY
PHYSICIANS GROUP

V

REQUEST OF INFORMATION
Bath Physicians Group
713 S Monroe Ave
Covington, VA 24426
Phone: 540-962-1122
Fax: 540-962-7881
Patient Name:

------------------ Date Of Birth: --------I authorize, Bath Community Physicians Group to:
Send / Receive

MY RECORDS To I From
Physician: ________________

Facility:

Reasons for Records: CONTINUATION OF CARE

Patient Social/Identifying# XXX-XX-_____

__ This consent is subject to revocation by the undersigned at any time. This request
Terminates six months from the Date of consent, without written revocation.
__ I hereby consent to the release of any and all records containing alcohol and /or drug abuse
and /or psychiatric diagnosis under the same consideration as outlined above. I understand
that such information cannot be released without specific consent, except in accordance
with a court order.
__ I further understand that I have a right to a copy of this authorization upon initial request
Copy request: _ _ Yes/ __ No

Copy Received: __ Yes/_No

o

OPERATIVE REPORTS
